name: Pro Pilkki 2
content:
files:
- pilkki_installer:
    filename: P2Installer_v1.3.exe
    url: http://propilkki.ddns.net/propilkki2/download/PP2_download.php?id=0
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/ProPilkki2/ProPilkki2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine Prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Windows 7 mode for Wine
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: win7
- task:
    description: Installing Pro Pilkki 2...
    exclude_processes: ProPilkki2.exe
    executable: pilkki_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    mscoree,mshtml: disabled
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
